title: Upload new photo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
AND selects on the Photos entity
custom_steps: WHEN a user uploads a photo
custom_expected: THEN the photo should be uploaded and appear in the photos list not published yet

title: Upload new photo and publish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
AND selects on the Photos entity
custom_steps:
WHEN a user uploads a photo
AND selects that photo after uploading
AND publish the photo
custom_expected: THEN the photo status should change from "Not Publish" to "Published"

title: Publishing a photo "Would you like to publish this content?" - Popup (Do not ask again - Not checked)
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the publish button
custom_expected:
THEN a pop up window appears with the following text "Would you like to publish this content? By continuing the operation, all the changes performed on the content will be applied and the updated entity will be publicly available to end users." 
AND clicking Publish will publish the photo
AND in green text "Published" should replace the "Not Published" red text

custom_steps:
WHEN a user edits an existing document by promoting to an editorial selection
AND publish the document
custom_expected: THEN all changes to the document is automatically saved, and published

title: Edit an existing document with by removing a tag or context
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps:
WHEN a user edits an existing document by removing a tag or context
AND publish the document
custom_expected: THEN all changes to the document is automatically saved, and published

title: Publishing a document "Would you like to publish this content?" - Popup (Do not ask again - Not checked)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the publish button
custom_expected:
THEN a pop up window appears with the following text "Would you like to publish this content? By continuing the operation, all the changes performed on the content will be applied and the updated entity will be publicly available to end users." 
AND clicking Publish will publish the document
AND in green text "Published" should replace the "Not Published" red text

title: Publishing a document "Would you like to publish this content?" - Popup (Do not ask again - checked)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the publish button
custom_expected: THEN in green text "Published" should replace the "Not Published" red text

title: Schedule a document publish
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps: WHEN a user creates a document and schedules a document for publish
custom_expected:
THEN the document is scheduled to be published at the given time
AND the document is published

title: Schedule a document unpublish
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a document that is currently published and schedules the document to be unpublished
custom_expected:
THEN the document is scheduled to be unpublished at the given time
AND the document is unpublished

title: Archive a document from Edit document
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects any document from the search list, and archives the document
custom_expected:
THEN the document is archived and the "RESTORE" button is present 
AND the document should no longer be present in the stories results

title: Archive a document from the documents Results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects any document for the search list by clicking on the square box to the left of the document title, and archives the document
AND a popup window for "Bulk Operations" appears, proceed to archive by clicking "OK"
custom_expected: THEN the action should process and the document should be no longer present in the documents results

title: Send document for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps:
WHEN a user creates a new document
AND selects the "Send for Approval"
custom_expected: THEN below the entity status the text "Waiting for approval" appears until it's approved by another user

title: Send document for approval - Reject
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps:
WHEN a user creates a new document
AND selects the "Send for Approval"
AND the document gets rejected by the "Reject" button
custom_expected:
THEN a "Reject" window appears asking for the reason for the rejection 
AND adding a comment is optional

title: Clone a document
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Forge
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects any document from the search list, and clone the document
custom_expected: THEN a copy of the document is created and redirected to the new copied document
